scenario: Bob received the following amounts during the year: Dividends: $31,544.00, Loan Proceeds: $18,140.43, Interest on Bank Account: $28,958.57.
question: Calculate Bob's gross income under I.R.C. § 61.
answer_explanation: Gross income includes all income from whatever source derived, unless excluded. Total: $60,502.57.
reasoning: Summed included items, ignored excluded items.
